description: Christopher, Warren -- Photographs; Rabin, Yitzhak, 1922-1995 -- Photographs
label: US Secretary of State Warren Christopher arrive in Israel again after he was several times over a period of a few days, Christopher was in the region for some shuttle diplomacy between Israel and Syria and then for the signing of the Gaza Jericho First agreement on 4 May 1994 in Cairo.
